original_title: Democrats warn Trump tariffs create Brexit-like uncertainty for US firms | Fox News
article_summary: "President Trump praises tariff-generated revenue inflow, while a new report warns that Trump's trade policy could reduce U.S. manufacturing investment by $490 billion by 2029, potentially slowing innovation, decreasing factory jobs, weakening supply chains, and diminishing U.S. competitiveness against global rivals like China."</s>
